levelRequirements.name: Member
levelRequirements.privilege: Downloaded at least 1 torrent.Can make requests, bookmarks, edit Collages, and can access the Top 10 *).

levelRequirements.name: Power User
levelRequirements.privilege: Uploaded at least 5 torrents.Receives invites, can access notifications, create new collages, access power user & invites forums.

levelRequirements.name: Torrent Master
levelRequirements.privilege: Uploaded at least 200 torrents. Can invite users even when invites are closed, Can send unlimited invites
